creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi
description: three images; central image of brown wall with many missing white tiles; four grey vertical columns with signs near bottom of columns with red and white stripes and "NO CLEARANCE BETWEEN COLUMNS" in red; left and right images are partial views of same scene
image_copyright: © Kenji Nakahashi %2F Center for Creative Photography%2C Arizona Board of Regents
markings: LRC on back stamped in purple: Kenji Nakahasi
signed: on back at bottom edge in black: Suway Wall, 1989 (Union Square, 14th Street, Lexington Avenue line, New York City) Printed by the Artist in 1989  K. Nakahashi
title: Subway Wall 1989 (Union Square, 14th Street, Lexington Avenue Line, New York City)
